title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment, Wood Floors, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi
* 24/7 Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!
Apartment Home Features:
* Oversized floor plan
* Large closets
* Wood floors
* Breakfast bar
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* All utilities included
Please schedule an appointment to tour using ResMate, our chatbot concierge on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com. You may take a guided tour in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

title: One Bedroom In Haverford , Close To Train
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: 3BR, 2.5Bth home with GARAGE in Bella Vista! 705-11 Pemberton #711
description:
705-11 Pemberton Street #711 -- Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer ( 2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Property is also listed for sale.	First, last and 1 month’s rent due when lease is signed.
Please reply by email with any questions, or to schedule a showing.

Why is it so hard to get into an apartment. I’m a hard working person I had to come back to Oregon because my mom is on hospice. Yet I have to live in my car. Any affordable leads would be appreciated.
Hello Portland! My name is Monica. I recently got to Portland after 9 years abroad teaching English and studying Eastern Culture (I love India and Nepal!). I also spent a few years in Mexico. Hablo espanole si quieres practicar conmigo! Mi espanole no es lo mejor pero podemos practicar! :) If you rent me a room I will give you unlimited free Spanish lessons. Bring your friends! Free for everyone. My story is weird. I am supposed to be in Buenos Aires finally starting my English school/ art gallery for marginalized communities, but I had to return to the USA for a dental implant! I had a bad horseback accident a year ago, my front tooth was knocked clean out! I am in Portland to get good quality medical care. It is the ONLY reason I am in the USA. The process will take about one year, as the healing periods between surgeries are super long. I would not be a bedridden smelly sad sack in your house though, the facial swelling only lasts a week after each surgery. In a year, I will have my magic teeth and can leave this rotting land of avarice. My first surgery will be in a few weeks. I am still teaching online, will be getting a job at a shelter soon. After 5 continents and 30 countries, I have never been anywhere as dynamically and needlessly tragic as Portland. So much suffering, so many people lost in a broken system. And a general populace that claims impotence. C'mon y'all, this is downright shameful. This country has gone to total shit, legal weed is cool though. During some post op healing periods, I will not be working. My father can personally guarantee that my rent will be paid, and he would be happy to talk with a prospective renter on the phone. He is paying for all rent I cannot cover and all rent/medical for the coming year. I love teaching, yoga, fitness, meditation, books, hiking, camping and sometimes 420. Not much drinking anymore, never wasted. I must admit I am a psychonaut (every few months or so to gain perspective). I am fairly solitary and aside from art projects and lots of adventures, I am usually reading. I would be happy to rent a room, garage, trailer (I mean, tiny house. Sorry Portland, haha) I would even be happy to rent a tent space in your back yard! I can pay up to 900 per month for whatever I end up renting. I have not driven in 17 years and don't plan on it. I skateboard and bicycle a lot though. Hello! Middle aged who is employed full time looking for a long term platonic non furnished room for rent. Starting over after divorce and struggling with today’s housing costs. I am looking for something safe and reliable for myself and my medium sized well behaved dog sometime around July 23rd. We are clean, quiet, and keep to ourselves and appreciate any serious replies. lets look for a place to rent together (Vancouver wa) dogs are OK - wooof hi I'm looking for a roommate someone who wants to look for a place to rent together split rent and utilities.im hoping for something around 800 to 900 max. Hello, I'm a young looking to rent a room in a specific part of Portland Oregon. I've recently stayed in hostels so I fully understand communal living and being considerate of roommates. I'm quite easy going friendly and generally keep my opinions to myself. Conscious & considerate of other people is absolutely how I would describe myself. I'm 420 friendly, enjoy an occasionally glass of wine and watching tv shows in my room. I enjoy going to the gym, hiking and being outdoors doing things when I have the time. I do have a job and cash saved so rent/utilities wont be an issue. I'm more than ok with shared chores & nessecities. I love pets but currently dont have any. I'm looking to rent somewhere near the Matt Dishman Community Center and the near the Red Robin. I think Id be a great fit as your hopeful future roommate. Quiet, responsible, and respectful & trustworthy middle aged couple with 15 pound corgi terrier, seeking small rental. We currently reside in & have been in Southern Oregon 12 years. Excellent references! (We have never paid rent late one time in all this time) We host/produce a national & syndicated FM radio show ( for 23 years now) & are into gardening, music, reading, Tai Chi & metaphysics. Hello there so I am looking for a nice clean room available to rent but only for about a month. I'm looking to pay around $400. I am currently unemployed but am seeking employment at this time. I just need a safe, stable, and clean room to rent to lay my head at night. I am a single 37yr old and not looking for a relationship nor am I any kind of prostitute. I was renting a room from a friend but their situation has changed so they are moving out so I'm having to go as well. please email me but only serious inquiries. thank you "

title: Beautiful courtyards, Elevator building, Seasonal Bike Share Program
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:
The studio apartment home at 2210 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 22nd floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 2, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: This 3 bed 2 bath Filter Square home is to good too miss!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available July 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th.
